words.def: all the loaves of bread baked at the same time
measuring instrument for indicating speed of rotation
a vessel containing liquid in which something is immersed (as to process it or to maintain it at a constant temperature or to lubricate it)
the basic unit of money in Thailand
a compartment at the front of a motor vehicle or locomotive where driver sits
headdress that protects the head from bad weather
feline mammal usually having thick soft fur and no ability to roar: domestic cats
nocturnal mouselike mammal with forelimbs modified to form membranous wings and anatomical adaptations for echolocation by which they navigate
a legal document codifying the result of deliberations of a committee or society or legislative body
An instance of the interjection ah.
(astronomy) the angular distance of a celestial point measured westward along the celestial equator from the zenith crossing
a soft silvery metallic element of the alkali earth group
a hard grey lustrous metallic element that is highly resistant to corrosion
a highly unstable radioactive element (the heaviest of the halogen series)
